snippet: Venus Williams, who has not played an official match since last year’s United States Open, will sit out the opening singles matches but is scheduled to play doubles.
abstract: Venus Williams, who has not played an official tennis match since the 2011 United States Open, will sit out the opening singles matches at the Fed Cup but is scheduled to play doubles.
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams, who has not played an official match since last year’s United States Open, will sit out the opening singles matches but is scheduled to play doubles.

headline.seo: Christina McHale Replaces Venus Williams in Fed Cup Singles
headline.main: On First Day, Only One Williams
headline.print_headline: On First Day, Only One Williams
